00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32F5XXXX_LEDC_H
00030 #define __HT32F5XXXX_LEDC_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32F5xxxx_Peripheral_Driver HT32F5xxxx Peripheral Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup LEDC
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup LEDC_Exported_Types LEDC exported types
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /**
00054  * @brief Selection of LEDC clock source
00055  */
00056 typedef enum
00057 {
00058   LEDC_SRC_PCLK = 0,
00059   LEDC_SRC_LSI,                    /*!< Low speed internal clock, about 32KHz                               */
00060   LEDC_SRC_LSE                     /*!< Low speed external 32768 Hz clock                                   */
00061 } LEDC_SRC_Enum;
00062 
00063 /**
00064  * @brief Selection of LEDC duty clock numbers
00065  */
00066 typedef enum
00067 {
00068   LEDC_DTYNUM_8 = 0,
00069   LEDC_DTYNUM_16,
00070   LEDC_DTYNUM_32,
00071   LEDC_DTYNUM_64
00072 } LEDC_DTYNUM_Enum;
00073 
00074 /**
00075  * @brief Definition of LEDC Init Structure 
00076  */
00077 typedef struct
00078 {
00079   LEDC_SRC_Enum    LEDC_ClockSource;
00080   LEDC_DTYNUM_Enum LEDC_DutyClockNumber;
00081   u32              LEDC_ClockPrescaler;
00082   u32              LEDC_COMxEN;
00083   u32              LEDC_DeadTime;
00084 } LEDC_InitTypeDef;
00085 
00086 /**
00087  * @brief Enumeration of LED layout mode.
00088  */
00089 typedef enum
00090 {
00091   COMMON_CATHODE,          /*!< LEDC SEG output polarity is non-inverted. */
00092                            /*!< LEDC COM output polarity is non-inverted.*/
00093   COMMON_CATHODE_WITH_NPN, /*!< LEDC SEG output polarity is non-inverted. */
00094                            /*!< LEDC COM output polarity is inverted.*/
00095   COMMON_ANODE_WITH_PNP,   /*!< LEDC SEG output polarity is inverted. */
00096                            /*!< LEDC COM output polarity is non-inverted.*/
00097   COMMON_ANODE_WITH_NPN,   /*!< LEDC SEG output polarity is inverted. */
00098                            /*!< LEDC COM output polarity is inverted.*/
00099 } LEDC_Mode;
00100 
00101 /**
00102   * @}
00103   */
00104 
00105 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00106 /** @defgroup LEDC_Exported_Constants LEDC exported constants
00107   * @{
00108   */
00109 
00110 /* Definitions of LEDCER                                                                                    */
00111 #define LEDC_COM0EN       0x0001   /*!< LEDC COM0 enable                                                    */
00112 #define LEDC_COM1EN       0x0002   /*!< LEDC COM1 enable                                                    */
00113 #define LEDC_COM2EN       0x0004   /*!< LEDC COM2 enable                                                    */
00114 #define LEDC_COM3EN       0x0008   /*!< LEDC COM3 enable                                                    */
00115 #define LEDC_COM4EN       0x0010   /*!< LEDC COM4 enable                                                    */
00116 #define LEDC_COM5EN       0x0020   /*!< LEDC COM5 enable                                                    */
00117 #define LEDC_COM6EN       0x0040   /*!< LEDC COM6 enable                                                    */
00118 #define LEDC_COM7EN       0x0080   /*!< LEDC COM7 enable                                                    */
00119 #if (LIBCFG_LEDC_NO_COM_8_11 == 0)
00120 #define LEDC_COM8EN       0x0100   /*!< LEDC COM8 enable                                                    */
00121 #define LEDC_COM9EN       0x0200   /*!< LEDC COM9 enable                                                    */
00122 #define LEDC_COM10EN      0x0400   /*!< LEDC COM10 enable                                                   */
00123 #define LEDC_COM11EN      0x0800   /*!< LEDC COM11 enable                                                   */
00124 #endif
00125 
00126 /* Definitions of COMxPOL                                                                                   */
00127 #define LEDC_COM0POL       0x00000001   /*!< LEDC COM0 polarity                                            */
00128 #define LEDC_COM1POL       0x00000002   /*!< LEDC COM1 polarity                                            */
00129 #define LEDC_COM2POL       0x00000004   /*!< LEDC COM2 polarity                                            */
00130 #define LEDC_COM3POL       0x00000008   /*!< LEDC COM3 polarity                                            */
00131 #define LEDC_COM4POL       0x00000010   /*!< LEDC COM4 polarity                                            */
00132 #define LEDC_COM5POL       0x00000020   /*!< LEDC COM5 polarity                                            */
00133 #define LEDC_COM6POL       0x00000040   /*!< LEDC COM6 polarity                                            */
00134 #define LEDC_COM7POL       0x00000080   /*!< LEDC COM7 polarity                                            */
00135 #if (LIBCFG_LEDC_NO_COM_8_11 == 0)
00136 #define LEDC_COM8POL       0x00000100   /*!< LEDC COM8 polarity                                            */
00137 #define LEDC_COM9POL       0x00000200   /*!< LEDC COM9 polarity                                            */
00138 #define LEDC_COM10POL      0x00000400   /*!< LEDC COM10 polarity                                           */
00139 #define LEDC_COM11POL      0x00000800   /*!< LEDC COM11 polarity                                           */
00140 #endif
00141 
00142 /* Definitions of SEGxPOL                                                                                   */
00143 #define LEDC_SEG0POL       0x00010000   /*!< LEDC SEG0 polarity                                            */
00144 #define LEDC_SEG1POL       0x00020000   /*!< LEDC SEG1 polarity                                            */
00145 #define LEDC_SEG2POL       0x00040000   /*!< LEDC SEG2 polarity                                            */
00146 #define LEDC_SEG3POL       0x00080000   /*!< LEDC SEG3 polarity                                            */
00147 #define LEDC_SEG4POL       0x00100000   /*!< LEDC SEG4 polarity                                            */
00148 #define LEDC_SEG5POL       0x00200000   /*!< LEDC SEG5 polarity                                            */
00149 #define LEDC_SEG6POL       0x00400000   /*!< LEDC SEG6 polarity                                            */
00150 #define LEDC_SEG7POL       0x00800000   /*!< LEDC SEG7 polarity                                            */
00151 
00152 #define LEDC_FLAG_FRAME           (1UL << 0)
00153 #define LEDC_INT_FRAME            (1UL << 0)
00154 
00155 
00156 /* check parameter of the LEDC mode                                                                         */
00157 #define IS_LEDC_MODE(x)      ((x == COMMON_CATHODE)        || (x == COMMON_CATHODE_WITH_NPN)  || \
00158                               (x == COMMON_ANODE_WITH_PNP) || (x == COMMON_ANODE_WITH_NPN))
00159 
00160 /**
00161  * @brief Used to check LEDC_SRC_Enum parameter
00162  */
00163 #define IS_LEDC_SRC(x)       ((x == LEDC_SRC_PCLK) || (x == LEDC_SRC_LSI) || (x == LEDC_SRC_LSE))
00164 #define IS_LEDC_DTYNUM(x)    ((x == LEDC_DTYNUM_8) || (x == LEDC_DTYNUM_16) || (x == LEDC_DTYNUM_32) ||\
00165                               (x == LEDC_DTYNUM_64))
00166 #define IS_LEDC_PSC(x)        (x < 4096)
00167 #define IS_LEDC_DTCR(x)       (x < 64)
00168 #define IS_LEDC_COMEN(x)    (((x & 0xF000) == 0x0) && (x != 0x0))
00169 #define IS_LEDC_COMPOL(x)   (((x & 0xFFFFF000) == 0x0) && (x != 0x0))
00170 #define IS_LEDC_SEGPOL(x)   (((x & 0xFF00FFFF) == 0x0) && (x != 0x0))
00171 
00172 /**
00173   * @}
00174   */
00175 
00176 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00177 /** @defgroup LEDC_Exported_Functions LEDC exported functions
00178   * @{
00179   */
00180 void LEDC_DeInit(void);
00181 void LEDC_Init(LEDC_InitTypeDef* LEDC_InitStruct);
00182 void LEDC_ClockSourceConfig(LEDC_SRC_Enum Source);
00183 void LEDC_Cmd(ControlStatus NewState);
00184 void LEDC_IntConfig(ControlStatus NewState);
00185 FlagStatus LEDC_GetFlagStatus(void);
00186 void LEDC_ClearFlagStatus(void);
00187 void LEDC_COMxConfig(u32 LEDC_COMxEN, ControlStatus Cmd);
00188 void LEDC_SetDeadTimeDuty(u32 LEDC_DeadTimeDuty);
00189 void LEDC_SetPolarityMode(u32 LEDC_COMxPOL, u32 LEDC_SEGxPOL , LEDC_Mode mode);
00190 #define  LEDC_SetData(COMx, data)   HT_LEDC->DR[COMx] = data
00191 #define  LEDC_GetData(COMx)         HT_LEDC->DR[COMx]
00192 /**
00193   * @}
00194   */
